entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Smith Airport 8:46 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
